name: Football Pools 2022-'23
description:
Predict Premier League, FA Cup, World Cup 2022 or other competitions! Create a pool and play with your friends, family and/ or colleagues.

- Matches can be predicted until 1 second before the start of the match.
- Prediction of matches and final rankings and topscorer.
- Own pool with own ranking.
- Free of charge up to 25 members.
- Possibility to hide your predictions.
- Send invitations easily.
- Available in Dutch and English.
